title: New Brunswick’s second COVID-19 case connected to first confirmed case, officials say
description: Dr. Jennifer Russell, the province’s chief medical officer of health, said the presumptive case is a man between 50 and 60 years of age in the southeastern part of the province.
content: FREDERICTON New Brunswick has a second case of COVID and health officials say it s connected to another case that was confirmed earlier this week Dr Jennifer Russell the province s chief medical officer of health said the presumptive case is a man bet chars
